title: 2 Twin Beds Club Access
description:
Overlooking the hotel garden and with a striking spaciousness of 40 square metres, it creates the feel of one generously large space with the ambience of a sophisticated home.


Amenities
> Complimentary Grand Club access
> Complimentary handy smartphone service with 4G internet access, unlimited local and international calls to selected countries
> Bathroom amenities by June Jacobs
> Tea making facility and Nespresso coffee machine
> Minibar Drawer Fridge for easier access
> In-room safe
> 55-inch TV with over 40 TV and audio channels
> Hotel pillow menu with options for selection

title: 1 King Bed Plateau with Club Access
description:
Escape to privacy and seclusion in a 50-square-metre room within the spa facility, offering treatments at Plateau Spa and access to fitness studios and garden.


Amenities
> Complimentary Grand Club access
> Complimentary handy smartphone service with 4G internet access, unlimited local and international calls to selected countries
> Bathroom amenities by June Jacobs
> Tea making facility and Nespresso coffee machine
> Minibar Drawer Fridge for easier access
> In-room safe
> 40 inch HDMI TV with over 40 TV channels and audio channels
> 20% discount on any Plateau Spa treatment during the stay
> Hotel pillow menu with options for selection
